author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Pinker: I enclose corrections of misprints in my novel. Kindly have them typed (with copy) and forwarded by two successive posts to my publisher in New York. In case of a new edition I should like the headings Chapter First &c cancelled and bastard titles inserted between the chapters simply numbered with Roman numerals. I &c. I should like to have a copy each of American edition of my book of stories and verses. The other copies of American edition of my novel have not reached me Sincerely yours James Joyce
